name: Alex Lacourt
about: I am an aspiring Mechanical Engineer with a passion for learning and helping others understand course material. My primary experience is in CAD design and prototyping. I currently work at the Innovation Center makerspace lab at the University of Kentucky, where we foster a collaborative environment for engineering students to bring their ideas to life. I thrive in team settings, combining hard work, discipline, and a positive attitude to deliver quality results and build strong relationships with teammates.

experience.title: Makerspace Lab Worker
experience.description: Worked in a student-led makerspace lab, ensuring safe practices and efficient use of university equipment. Assisted students in bringing projects from concept to final product and promoted a collaborative learning environment.

activities: Track and Field - State Champion in the 4x800m relay 2023
Young Life - Bible Study Leader, Worship Leader
